comment: Lemma for ~ binomcxp . When ` C ` is a nonnegative integer, the binomial's finite sum value by the standard binomial theorem ~ binom equals this generalized infinite sum: the generalized binomial coefficient and exponentiation operators give exactly the same values in the standard index set ` ( 0 ... C ) ` , and when the index set is widened beyond ` C ` the additional values are just zeroes. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Apr-2020.)
